divs: Sighting Detailsdriveing home after droping someone off near sanford lake mi on the way back my nephew dring said what the **** i looked to the left from top of trees we seen a greenish blue object falling at a angle at a high rate of speed but not super fast that we couldnot get a detail .we seen for about 20 to 40 seconds the center of seemed brighter .behind it left a trail of fireish sparks .ive seen falling stars and comets this was strange it left us puzzeled .i would realy like to know what that was .i hear something was spotted like that nere detriot with hellecopters in following.it was heading approx. northeast when we lost site of the object.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Sanford
There were no other sightings in Sanford on or around January 20th 2011
